name: annotation
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a short explanation or note added to a text or image, or the act of adding short explanations or notes: The annotation of literary texts makes them more accessible. The revised edition of the book includes many useful annotations.
computing, language
  specialized a description or piece of information added to data, for example a label saying whether a word is a noun, a verb, etc., or the act of adding this: Computerized spoken-dialect data with annotations is available. Manual annotation is usually performed in the creation of experimental datasets. Related words
annotate
annotator
More examplesFewer examplesThe new translation of the Latin work includes extensive annotation by scholars. It's a book that cries out for annotation.The program is designed for annotation of images.There is an easy-to-use facility in the program for adding annotations to your document.
